content:
Provide a YAML with the intent(s) and entity(s) of this customer service message to a food delivery app. Use the schema above and obey all instructions within. Only include the YAML in your output. 

---
FROM: user 192IUS
REQUEST: cancel order 1029487
NOTES: Hi I just ordered some Mexican food but the delivery estimate went from 15 minutes to 2 hours and that doesn't work I would like to cancel the order please - Hannah

chosen:
cancel order:
  restaurant: Mexican food
  date: none
  customer: 192IUS
rejected:
cancel order:
  restaurant: Mexican food
  date: none
  customer: Hannah
